buildup.text: The demographic dividend: when falling birth rates create a bulge of working-age adults with fewer dependents.

discovery.text: East Asia's economic miracle was 30-50% driven by demographics.

punchline.text: A young population is an opportunity. But only if you give them something to do.

quiz.question: What creates a 'demographic dividend'?
options: Falling birth rates that create a large working-age population relative to dependents, boosting economic productivity
